headline: The Smartest High-Yielding Dividend Stocks in the S&P 500 Index to Buy With $3,000 Right Now
summary: Dividend stocks can be a great way for investors to generate passive income.  Dividends can also be more predictable than stock prices, which have fluctuated intensely this year.  The stock market has been incredibly volatile this year, registering a nearly 20% fall from February highs before bouncing back with a roughly 20% gain since President Donald Trump's sweeping tariff announcement in April.

headline: This Stock Is Up Over 8,400% Since Its IPO. Here's Why It's Still a Buy.
summary: When considering the business conditions under which it operates and its position in the market, the stock remains a buy despite those gains.  Realty Income specializes in single-tenant commercial properties.  Additionally, Realty Income has grown steadily under a variety of conditions.
